string.name: about_text
string.i: Infomage is used for text embeding and extracting on digital images. It implementes F5 algorithm used in image steganography on Android.

string.name: license_text
string.i: This software is based on the work of James R. Weeks(james@obrador.com), the Independent JPEG Group (package james, libjpeg), Sean Breslin/Dr. Ortega (package ortega), and Andreas Westfeld(F5 algorithm).

resources.string:
Infomage has three main functions: Embedding, Extracting and Option. The interface is clear and simple. It will guide you to finish embedding your text to an image step by step.

 Function 1: Embed information in a image file using F5 algorithm

 Step 0: The initial interface is for embedding! Do nothing but go on.

 Step 1: Choose a picture to embed. You can either take a picture or upload a local picture.

 Step 2: Input the text you want to embed and the embedding password. You can either enter your text through keyboard or upload a text file(the application will automatically read the contents of the text file).

 Step 3: Embedding Success. You will be asked if you want to sent the embedded image via email. If you press "yes", you will be prompt to step 4(see Step 4). If you press "No", it will show you the path of the embed image and you can press the exit button to exit the application. 

 Step 4: Choose an email application installed in your device previously. After you log in, the embedded image will be automatically attached in the email you are composing.

 Function 2: Extract information in an embedded image file

 Step 0: Choose "Extract" from the left menu of the initial interface. 

 Step 1: Press the button and upload a local image. 

 Step 2: Enter the extract password, which is the same as the embedding password. 

 Step 3: If extracted Successfully. You will be shown the information extracted from the image(if it do contains embedded text). If you press the "Save" button, all the extracted info will be saved in a text file(you can choose the outpath for the text file, see Function 3). Or you can press "Exit" button to exit the application.

 Function 3: Choose "Option" from the left menu of the initial interface

 Step 0: Choose "Option" from the left menu of the initial interface. 

 Step 1: You can choose the embedding text input method: via keyboard or via file. You can also specify the output directory for the embeded image and the the text file saving extracted information.
